posts.post_content:
Shooting himself in the foot, but at least trying to be honest, the Old Prof notes that this is the most overgraded 4 in PSA history.  The mark referred to may be a faint pencil trace over Keefe's face, or it may be a small "O" under the R in "CIGARETTES" on the reverse.

In addition, some vandal took cut into the top part of the card, leaving a deep scratch about a quarter inch down from the top, running parallel to the edge.

Nonetheless, it is what it is.  Asking $150.

FRIDAY AFTERNOON-- CARD HAS BEEN SOLD.  THANKS FOR YOUR INTEREST.
email sent through N54. My email is [url]paulgx3@yahoo.com[/url]

I'll take it if it's still available.  
Email has been sent.



-Josh
